When used with a Staff of the Dead, the staff will have identical stats to the Staff of the Dead but with a special attack that fires a magical fire ball at your opponent hitting similar to a ballista spec. This special attack will cost 65% per use.

Should we add an ability to purchase a Runic Orb of Binding from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This runic orb will require the player to charge it with a minimum of 100 Nature, Earth, and Water runes to activate it. All runes stored in the orb will be lost on PK death.

Should we add an ability to purchase a Runic Orb of Teleblock from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This runic orb will require the player to charge it with a minimum of 100 Law, Chaos, and Death runes to activate it. All runes stored in the orb will be lost on PK death.

Should we add an ability to purchase a Runic Orb of Fire from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This runic orb will require the player to charge it with a minimum of 100 Wrath, Fire, and Air runes to activate it. All runes stored in the orb will be lost on PK death.

Should we add an ability to purchase an ethereum scroll from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This scroll when combined with bracelet of ethereum, 1000 revenant ethers, and any of the Culinaromancer gloves, will create an Unworldly Bracelet. The Unworldly Bracelet will have the stats of the Culinaromancer gloves used combined with the effects of the bracelet of ethereum.

Should we add an ability to purchase an unskulling scroll from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This scroll will be tradeable and can only be used once outside the Wilderness and in safe areas when not in combat on PvP worlds.

Should we add an ability to purchase an amulet of avarice upgrade from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This upgraded amulet will allow players to use the protect item prayer without draining prayer points and the attachment will be lost on PK death.
Should we add an ability to purchase clue scrolls from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog?

Should we add an ability to purchase an Elder maul attachment from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? When attached to the Elder maul, it will add +3 Strength bonus and +10 Crush Attack bonus to the weapon.
Should we add an ability to purchase the Thammaron’s Set from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This set will include the top, bottoms, and hood and will require 60 Magic to equip.
Should we add an ability to purchase a taunt animation from the LMS Reward shop as described in the blog? This will play immediately upon killing a player.
Should players be able to own more than one rune pouch? If this question passes, each one would link to the same store of runes.
Should players be able to own more than one looting bag? If this question passes, each one would link to the same store of items.
Should the drop rate of the looting bag scale to the combat level of Wilderness NPCs? Looting bags will not become rarer drops as a result of this change.

Should Elemental runes be included in the Bounty Hunter shop as part of the rework? These tradeable runes can each act as Air, Water, Earth or Fire runes and can be used anywhere in the Wilderness. They would cost 1 Bounty point for 100 runes.

Should Dagon'hai robes be added as a rare reward from opening the Larran's chest in deep Wilderness? Each piece would have a 1/256 chance to be received. The full set would require 70 Magic and 40 Defence to equip, and offer 48 Magic attack, 40 Magic defence and 6 Prayer bonus in total.

Should four permanent unlocks be added to the Bounty Hunter store? Each one would change the colour of a godsword's special attack animation swipe to gold. They would cost 100 points each and could be toggled on/off once bought.

Should an upgrade item for the Saradomin sword be added as a very rare reward from Bounty crates? This would give it a new special attack that costs 60% energy and deals 50%-150% of the user's maximum hit as Magic damage (rolling the user's Slash bonus against the opponent's Magic Defence), much like the original Korasi sword. This upgrade item could be applied to both the normal and blessed versions of the sword.
SShould an upgrade item for the abyssal dagger be added as a very rare reward from Bounty crates? This would reduce its special attack energy cost to 25% and increase its accuracy by 20%.

Should Statius' warhammer be added as an extremely rare reward from bounty crates in the rework design? It would last one hour in combat before degrading to nothing. It would convert to 2,500,000 coins if lost on death, causing the player to be cursed by Statius. This can be lifted for 3,000,000 coins. If neither questions 15 or 16 pass, it will only be usable against other players.

Should Vesta's spear be added as an extremely rare reward from bounty crates in the rework design? It would last one hour in combat before degrading to nothing. It would convert to 2,500,000 coins if lost on death, causing the player to be cursed by Vesta. This can be lifted for 3,000,000 coins. If neither questions 15 or 16 pass, it will only be usable against other players.

Should Vesta's longsword be added as an extremely rare reward from bounty crates in the rework design? Unlike the Deadman version, the special attack cost would be 50% rather than 25%. It would last one hour in combat before degrading to nothing. It would convert to 2,500,000 coins if lost on death, causing the player to be cursed by Vesta. This can be lifted for 3,000,000 coins. If neither questions 15 or 16 pass, it will only be usable against other players.

Should Zuriel's staff be added as an extremely rare reward from bounty crates in the rework design? It would last one hour in combat before degrading to nothing. It would convert to 2,500,000 coins if lost on death, causing the player to be cursed by Zuriel. This can be lifted for 3,000,000 coins. If neither questions 15 or 16 pass, it will only be usable against other players.

Should Morrigan's throwing axes be added as an extremely rare reward from bounty crates in the rework design? They would always be lost after being thrown. They would convert to 3,000 coins each if lost on death. If neither questions 15 or 16 pass, they will only be usable against other players.

Should Morrigan's javelins be added as an extremely rare reward from bounty crates in the rework design? They would always be lost after being thrown. They would convert to 6,000 coins each if lost on death. If neither questions 16 or 16 pass, they will only be usable against other players.
If any Ancient Warriors' weapons are added to the game, should they be usable in all of the Wilderness, including against NPCs?
If any Ancient Warriors' weapons are added to the game and question #9 passes, should they also be usable outside of the Wilderness?
Should the Twisted League offer cosmetic armour rewards as described in the blog? This will consist of three tiers of cosmetic outfits that represent the league.
Should the Twisted League offer a Twisted League-Themed banner reward as described in the blog? These will be similar to the Kourend house banners and be held in the main-hand slot.

Should the Twisted League offer a Twisted League Slayer Helm recolour reward as described in the blog? The recolour will require 1000 Slayer points to unlock to be consistent with the other Slayer helm recolours.

Should the Twisted League offer a Twisted League Home Teleport Animation reward as described in the blog? This will be similar to the default home teleport animation but the player will draw a black/green circle on the ground. When teleporting away a Xerician symbol appears under them.
Should the Twisted League offer a Twisted League Themed PoH wallkit reward as described in the blog?
Should the Twisted League offer a Twisted League Ancestral Robes Ornament Kit reward as described in the blog?
Should the Twisted League offer cosmetic Twisted League trophy rewards as described in the blog? This trophy will represent the tier you place in and will be untradeable.
Should the Coal Bag have an 'Open/Close' option? When the bag is open, coal that you mine would go into the bag instead of your inventory.
Should the Gem Bag have an 'Open/Close' option? When the bag is open, gems that you mine would go into the bag instead of your inventory.
If Question #2 passes, should this effect apply to gems stolen from Tzhaar creatures?
Should the Herb Sack have an 'Open/Close' option? When the sack is open, grimy herbs that you pick up would go into the sack instead of your inventory.
If Question #4 passes, should this effect apply to herbs grown in farming patches?
If Question #4 passes, should this effect apply to herbs harvested from a Herbiboar?
Should the Seed Box have an 'Open/Close' option? When the box is open, seeds that you pick up would go into the box instead of your inventory.
Should the Bruma Torch be able to light the braziers in Wintertodt?
Should the Bruma Torch act as a light source and be usable for smoking Hunter traps? This would bring it in line with regular torches.

Should players be able to recolour their phoenix pets using 1,000 gnomish firelighters? The firelighters would all have to be the same colour. The available recolours would be red, green, blue, purple, and white.
Should a right-click/long-press 'Previous Destination' option be added to charter ships? Selecting this option would take you to the last place you chartered a ship.

Should the rat behemoths in Evil Dave's basement have a 1/3 chance to drop one of Doris' shakers? Each behemoth would drop one of four coloured shakers which could be used to store an (almost) infinite number of doses of their respective colour spice. If both this and Question #13 pass, only the one with the most Yes votes will be implemented.

Should players be able to build a Spice Rack in the Kitchen of their Player Owned Houses? It would require 60 Construction, 3 Teak Planks, 6 Soft Clay, and the 4 dose versions of each colour spice. The rack would be used to store an (almost) infinite number of doses of each spice. If both this and Question #12 pass, only the one with the most Yes votes will be implemented.

Should a toggleable right-click/long-press 'Equip' option be added to equipable items in your inventory while the Bank interface is open? A button in the Bank interface would be added to see your equipped items should you wish to unequip them again without closing the interface.
Should a toggleable right-click/long-press 'Eat' option be added to food in your inventory while the Bank interface is open?
Should a toggleable right-click/long-press 'Drink' option be added to suitable items in your inventory while the Bank interface is open?

Should the increased run restoration effect be split among the pieces of the Graceful outfit? Each piece would give 3% or 4% increased run energy restoration with a 10% bonus for wearing the full set, matching the current total of 30%.
Should a new 'explore' emote be added as a reward for completing 600 Beginner clues?
Should Air, Water, Earth, Fire, Mind and Body talismans be added to the Beginner clue loot table?

Should the Hard clue step that requires players to enter the Duel Arena be moved to outside the actual arena? This would mean they would no longer require the assistance of another player to complete this step.
Should Crystal tools behave as their Dragon counterparts do rather than become unusable when they are inactive? This would be in line with Infernal tool behaviour.
Should Crystal tools be prevented from consuming charges when using them doesn't provide an additional benefit?
Should players receive a red message in the chatbox when they receive a new music track? This would come with a toggle for the feature to be enabled/disabled in the settings tab.
If you dodge the Maiden's blood splat attack, should the chances of a blood spawn appearing be halved?
Should the blood spawns cap be lowered overall, and increase as the Maiden absorbs nylocas?

Should the chances of freezing the nylocas during the Maiden boss fight scale based on the player's effective Magic accuracy bonus (including hidden bonuses such as the Void knight set), reaching 100% at 140 and above?
Should the Puro Puro interface be updated to the one shown in the poll blog? It features better use of space.
Should the Mage Training Arena interface be updated to the one shown in the poll blog? It matches the style of other interfaces and features quantity buttons for easier bulk-purchasing.
Should players be able to dig-up herbs after planting them? If this question passes, the XP given for planting the seed will be given when the herb is cleared or harvested instead.

Should the Jewellery Box found in Player Owned Houses receive a right-click/long-press 'Previous Location' option? This would teleport the player to the last location that the Jewellery Box was used to teleport to.
Which version of Dragonstone armour do you prefer? The most popular option will become the final appearance of the set.
Should players be able to re-arrange the order in which Prayers appear in the Prayer tab? Doing so would not affect the icon size.
Should players be able to receive a new Blurite Sword by giving Thurgo a blurite ore and 2 iron bars after completion of The Knight's Sword quest?
Should players be able to receive a new Dark Dagger from Radimus Erkle after completing Legends' Quest?
Should the Weiss Teleport be made available via the Portal Nexus in the Player Owned House?
Should the teleports available on the Arceuus spellbook be made available via the Portal Nexus in the Player Owned House?
Should the Account Management tab be updated to show when a poll is open, open the past poll archive, and allow players to vote?
Should Fremennik Sea Boots (from the Fremennik Achievement Diary) have their inventory icons adjusted to point at an angle as shown in the poll blog? This should make them look more like boots.
Should we add a new group boss called The Nightmare to Old School RuneScape? This boss would be located in the depths of the Slepe Dungeon.
Should The Inquisitor's Mace be a potential reward from The Nightmare? This item will be tradeable and requires 75 Attack to equip.
Should the Staff of Nightmares be a potential reward from The Nightmare? This item will require 65 Magic to equip when uncharged and can be altered with different coloured orbs.
If question 3 passes, should the Harmonised Orb be a potential reward from The Nightmare as described in the blog?
If question 3 passes, should the Volatile Orb be a potential reward from The Nightmare as described in the blog?
If question 3 passes, should the Eldritch Orb be a potential reward from The Nightmare as described in the blog?

Should the Siren's Tome be a potential reward from The Nightmare? The boss will drop a tradeable Siren's Charm which can be attached to a Mage's Book to create the untradeable Siren's Tome. The tome will require 75 Magic to equip.
Should The Inquisitor's Armour be a potential reward from The Nightmare? This armour will be tradeable and require 70 Strength and 30 Defence to equip.
Should we add the Sins of the Father quest? This will be a new Myreque quest that unlocks the vampyre city of Darkmeyer.
If Question 1 passes, should we add the blood shard, as described in the blog? This item can be obtained via pickpocketing vyrelords and vyreladies or killing elite vyrewatch.
Should you have the option to pay 80 Slayer points to unlock vampyres as a new task from Konar, Duradel, Chaeldar and Nieve/Steve?
Should you have the option to pay 100 Slayer points to extend vampyre tasks from all Slayer masters that can assign them? This will increase the task to between 200-250.
If Question 1 passes, should Darkmeyer include the Daeyalt Essence Mine as described in the blog?
If Question 1 passes, should we add the Hallowed Sepluchre as described in the blog?
If Question 6 passes, should the Hallowed Sepluchre include the ability to loot a Ring of Endurance from within the crypt as described in the blog?
If Question 6 passes, should the Hallowed Sepluchre include the ability to loot a Strange Old Lockpick from within the crypt as described in the blog?
If Question 6 passes, should the Hallowed Sepluchre have a reward shop that contains untradeable rewards, as described in the blog, that aid you in raiding the crypt?
If Question 6 passes, should the Hallowed Sepluchre have the Dark Dye reward added to its reward shop? This untradeable dye will recolour pieces of graceful to make dark graceful.
If Question 6 passes, should the Hallowed Sepluchre have the Dark Acorn reward added to its reward shop? This untradeable acorn will recolour the giant squirrel pet to make black and red.
Should superior monsters in the Iorwerth Dungeon have a guaranteed crystal shard drop, instead of the current common drop chance?
Should we increase the amount of monsters per room in the Iorwerth Dungeon to a minimum of 6?
Should we change one of the mutated bloodveld rooms in the Iorwerth Dungeon into a regular bloodveld room? Currently, there are no regular bloodvelds in the dungeon.
Should we change one of the greater nechryael rooms in the Iorwerth Dungeon into a regular nechryael room? Currently, there are no regular nechryaels in the dungeon.

Should we add a room to the Iorwerth Dungeon that will allow you to cannon elves again? This was previously possible in the Mourners HQ but was removed for thematic purposes. Lore-wise, these new elves would be Iorwerth sympathisers hiding out in the dungeon.
Should the demi-bosses in the Gauntlet always drop a weapon frame?
Should we allow players to use 1000 crystal shards on the Blade of Saeldor to create an infinitely charged version?

Should we make crystal shards and crystal dust tradable? Players would still need to have completed Song of the Elves to use them. If this passes, crystal shards will be given a high alchemy value of 12,000 coins and a starting price on the Grand Exchange of 15,000 coins. Similarly, crystal dust will be given a high alchemy value of 1,200 coins and a starting price on the Grand Exchange of 1,500 coins

Should we let players trade crystal tool seeds, crystal weapon seeds, crystal armour seeds and enhanced crystal teleport seeds for crystal shards at an NPC who can be found in the pub in Prifddinas? The proposed rates would be: crystal weapon seed - 10 shards, crystal tool seed - 100 shards, crystal armour seed - 250 shards, enhanced crystal teleport seed - 150 shards.

Should players be able to add crystal dust to Bastion Potions? This will require 86 Herblore and will create a Divine Bastion Potion which provides the same stat boost, except it is renewed every 15 seconds for 5 minutes. If stats are reduced to a level below your base stat, the potion’s effect will wear off.

Should players be able to add crystal dust to Battlemage Potions? This will require 86 Herblore and will create a Divine Battlemage Potion which provides the same stat boost, except it is renewed every 15 seconds for 5 minutes. If stats are reduced to a level below your base stat, the potion’s effect will wear off.
Should we add crystal shards and crystal acorns to the crystal impling drop table?
Should we improve the percentage save rate on the Elven Signet from 5% to 10%?
Should we allow the space bar to remember the last item you created? Pressing the space bar will repeat the create action.
Should we add Deposit Quantity buttons to the Bank Deposit screen for the desktop version of the game?

Should we add a ‘Last Searched’ section to the Grand Exchange to allow you to quickly buy items based on the last thing you entered? This would appear when searching for an item to sell on the Grand Exchange interface.
Should we rework the Contact NPC spell to remove the unnecessary dialog when first contacting a Slayer NPC?
Should we add more Slayer Tasks to Krystilia’s list? The tasks in question would include bloodvelds, hill giants, moss giants, black knights, pirates and zombies.
Should we increase the drop chance of mossy keys from moss giants killed in the Wilderness?
Should the Sawmill's menu be replaced with the standard Make-X interface, as used for skilling activities like smelting and glassblowing? This would allow the use of keyboard short-cuts.
Should we add a hammer spawn to the crab room in the Chambers of Xeric? This would also apply to Challenge Mode.
Should we add the ability to transmogrify the Tangleroot pet? This would require using a specific seed each time you want to change, much like the Phoenix pet recolours.
Should we increase the number of burnt pages received from Wintertodt supply crates by 50%? This wouldn't increase the drop chance, just the amount received from each drop.
Should we increase the number of burnt pages you receive from turning in a Tome of Fire from 100 to 250?
Should we allow players to exchange their Pyromancer set pieces for an amount of burnt pages depending on the piece exchanged as described in the blog?
Should we add a new travel option from Lunar Island to Rellekka for players who’ve completed the Elite Diary and no longer need to carry their Seal of Passage?
Should we remove the ‘Talk’ option to pickpocketable H.A.M. members and make the left-click option ‘Pickpocket’? Unpickpocketable H.A.M. members would retain their ‘Talk’ options.
Should we lower Sarachnis’ respawn timer from 30 seconds to 10 seconds?
Should we lower the aggro range of taloned and long-tailed wyverns?
Should we allow players to convert Viggora's Chainmace, Thammaron’s Sceptre and Craw's Bow into Revenant Ether? These would break down to 7,500 Ether each.
Should we add the Keris and Bearheads to Perdu's shop? These would be available to buy at 10k for the Keris and 5k for a few spare Bearheads.
Should we change the left-click option on the Puro Puro portal to ‘Leave’?
Should seeds pickpocketed from Master Farmers go straight into an open Seed Box?
Should we add the Herb Sack as a reward from Tithe Farm for 250 points? This would make it accessible from both the Slayer Reward shop and the Tithe Farm reward shop.
Should the Elite Desert Diary Nardah teleport send you into the temple for quicker access to the Statuette?
Should the combat level of the skeleton found in the Restless Ghost quest be lowered from 13 to 6? This change should give new players a better chance of completing the quest.

Should the Inquisitor’s Armour have a set effect? For each piece equipped, both damage and accuracy will be boosted by 0.5% while using the crush attack style. If all three pieces are equipped, an additional 1.0% boost will be given, for a total of 2.5%.
Should the negative slash and stab attack bonuses be removed from all three pieces of the Inquisitor’s Armour set?
Should the energy cost of the Eldritch Nightmare Staff’s Invocate special attack be reduced to 50%?
Should the inner square of rooms in The Gauntlet be predetermined to always contain the same basic resources? This will not apply to the Corrupted Gauntlet mode.
Should demi bosses be spawned in set positions on the outer edge of The Gauntlet to make them easier to find? They will only spawn in 6 of the 12 areas highlighted in the blog.
Should we buff the max hit of the Crystal Staff in the Gauntlet to be equivalent to the Crystal bow and Halberd?
Should we reduce the number of resources required for upgrading your armour in The Gauntlet as described in the blog?
Should we allow automatic vial smashing in The Gauntlet? This will only apply if you have unlocked the ability to smash vials after drinking potions and have the option toggled on.
Should the time taken to cook food and fill vials while in The Gauntlet be reduced to just one tick?
Should we play an animation and a sound effect just before the Crystalline Hunllef changes attack style? If this question passes we would also make the Ranged and Magic attacks easier to see.

Should we remove the lighting transition when Dawn flies away during the Grotesque Guardians fight? This will allow Dusk to become attackable as soon as Dawn flies away. The transition will remain for the part where she flies back.
Should we make the Grotesque Guardians reach their places faster during the transition so that they can be attacked sooner?
Should we reduce the leftover lightning phase transition time in the Grotesque Guardians fight?
Should we allow reduced damage to pass through when the phase changes during the Grotesque Guardians fight?
Should we remove the magic defence and increase the melee defence on the melee vanguard?
Should we reduce vanguards' defence and augment their hitpoints while otherwise maintaining the room’s difficulty?

Should we add a visual cue to each vanguard that will indicate when their health is too high or low and the fight is at risk of resetting? There will be different appearances for when the vanguard is too healthy or too hurt.
Should we add a HUD to vanguards, and to all Chambers of Xeric bosses? This should allow us to display the health bracket at which vanguards will reset.
If Question #14 or #15 passes, should we increase the size of the bracket of the vanguards’ reset mechanic for raids with less than five players?
Should we reduce the vanguards’ aggro range to make it less likely to be attacked by multiple vanguards when standing in the corners of the room?
Should we guarantee at least one Overload potion drop from vanguards?
Should the chance of getting grubs from chests in the Chambers of Xeric be based on Thieving levels?
Should Thieving level increase the chance of getting multiple grubs from a chest?
Should Thieving level increase the overall chance of finding a grub in a chest?
Should potion drops appear on top of raid supplies and bones in the Chambers of Xeric?

Should we allow construction of an extra-large storage unit within the Chambers of Xeric which will hold up to 1,500 supplies? Building the unit will require 99 Construction and an additional two planks.
Should Vespula's flying form be added to the Olmlet metamorphosis list?
Should Tekton's enraged form be added to the Olmlet metamorphosis list?

Should the Twisted Ornament Kit be added to the Chambers of Xeric (Challenge Mode) loot table? Using the kit with Ancestral Robes will recolour them to the Twisted theme, as displayed in the Twisted League reward blog.
If question 27 passes, should the Twisted Ornament kit be tradeable? This will consume the kit when used.
Should we display your best time in solo and groups after completing the Chambers of Xeric?
Should we implement superior versions of turoths, wyrms, hydras and drakes?
Should we add an anvil next to the furnace in Lumbridge? This would only allow players to smith bronze items.
Should we add a new retractable panel on the Equipment window which lists stats and set effects for the equipment you’re wearing?
Should we allow players to recolour the Rocky pet by feeding it berries?
Should herb farming patches be changed to be the same colour as the planted herb?
Should we allow players to own both potential rewards of the Rag and Bone Man quest, the Bonesack and Ram Skull Helm, at the same time?
Should we add the option to create a Mythical Max Cape by combining the Mythical Cape and the Max Cape? This cape will have the same stats and utility as a Mythical Cape.
Should we allow players to unlock new kinds of Monkey backpack by completing laps of the Ape Atoll Agility course as described in the blog?

Should it be possible to buy a soft clay pack from the Mining Guild Mineral Exchange for 10 unidentified minerals? This item would work the same way as the soft clay pack from Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop.

Should it be possible to buy a bag full of gems from the Mining Guild Mineral Exchange for 20 unidentified minerals? This item would work the same way as the bag full of gems from Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop.
Should the furniture in the PoH costume room be upgradable so that players do not have to empty a wardrobe, rack or chest to replace it by a better one?
Should we increase the number of black knights and bloodvelds in the Wilderness?
Should we introduce a new Slayer Master in Mor Ul Rek that only assigns boss tasks ? This Slayer Master would require you to have 100 Combat and 75 Slayer.
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master have a separate task system, allowing you to have both a normal Slayer Task and a Boss Slayer Task at the same time?

Assuming question #1 passes, since you will not be able to skip tasks with this Slayer Master by talking to Turael, should the Master provide one free skip a day to alleviate the issue of getting stuck with a task you don't want to do?
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master allow you to pick your own Boss Slayer Task for points?
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master allow you to 'store' one Boss Task for points? This task would only be retrievable if you do not currently have a Boss Task.
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master allow you to block tasks for points, similar to normal Slayer Masters? There would be two block slots available.
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master allow you to extend certain Boss Tasks for points? This would increase the minimum and maximum quantity of the boss assigned.
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master be able to assign you Alchemical Hydra tasks? Currently Konar quo Maten is the only Slayer Master able to assign this task.

Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master have an optional unlock to get a low quantity of Corporeal Beast as a Slayer Task? This task would have to be completed solo and require you to use the private task-only instance.
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master have an optional unlock to get a low quantity of The Nightmare as a Slayer Task? This task would have to be completed solo.
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master have an optional unlock to get a low quantity of Hunllef (The Gauntlet) as a Slayer Task?
Assuming question #1 passes, should this Slayer Master offer a tertiary roll for each kill on a task to give a chance of some rewards?
Assuming question #12 passes, should this Slayer Master's tasks give bosses a semi-rare chance to drop teleport scrolls that let you get to the boss slightly faster?
Assuming question #12 passes, should this Slayer Master's tasks give bosses an uncommon chance to drop a small amount of supplies, in aid of lengthening your trip?
Assuming question #12 passes, should this Slayer Master's tasks give bosses a very rare chance to drop the Divine Reliquary?
Should the rare drop table be changed so its drops are in addition to drops you'd otherwise get, rather than replacing other drops?
Assuming question #12 passes, should this Slayer Master's tasks give bosses a very rare chance to drop the Lustrous Gem?
Should having the Slayer Cape equipped or in your inventory let the player use any Slayer Master regardless of combat level restriction?
Should we rework the Player Owned House Costume Room as proposed?
If Question 1 passes, should Ultimate Iron players be allowed to deposit individual pieces?
If Question 1 passes, should Ultimate Iron players be allowed to withdraw individual pieces?
If Question 1 passes, should Ultimate Iron players be allowed to store duplicate pieces?
Should we increase the number of armour and mage sets you can store in the Magic Wardrobe and Armour Case, as outlined in the blog?
Should Zahur the herbalist in Nardah be able to clean banknoted herbs for 200GP each following completion of the Hard Desert Achievement Diary?
Should we implement the ability to automatically clean all the herbs in your Inventory after the first?
Should snape grass decompose into supercompost instead of regular compost when added to a compost bin?
Should we add seaweed spores to the Master Farmers’ pickpocketing loot table? They would appear rarely.
Should we allow players to exchange Spirit Seeds or saplings for Tier 5 seed packs at the Farming Guild as described in the blog?
Should we add a level 71 Agility shortcut to the Gu’Tanoth hard clue scroll location for players who have completed the ‘Watchtower’ quest?
Should we allow players to bring Stamina and Energy potions into the Rogues’ Den?
Should we add lap-count trackers to all Agility courses?

Should we add an Ancient Lectern to the Pyramid from Desert Treasure? This would allow players to make Ancient Teleport Tablets. Players would have to complete Desert Treasure before they could use or create the tablets.
Should we add a Lunar Lectern to Lunar Island? This would allow players to make Lunar Teleport Tablets. Players would have to complete Lunar Diplomacy before they could use or create the tablets.
Should we add the ability to withdraw all the gems from a Gem Bag into the Inventory, starting with sapphires?
Should stolen gems from Gem Stalls go straight into a Gem Bag?
Should we allow players to fill their Coal Bag from the Bank?
Should the Hallowed Treasure Sack, containing loot worth an average of 100,000 gold pieces, be made available in the Hallowed Sepulchre Reward Shop for 100 Hallowed Marks?
If Question 17 passes, should the Hallowed Treasure Sack contain a guaranteed 50 amylase crystals as part of the 100,000GP value of the sack?

If Question 17 passes, should the Dark Acorn have its price decreased from 5,000 Hallowed Marks to 3,000 Hallowed Marks? Players who already own one will be refunded the difference if this question passes.
Should we allow players to store Hallowed Sepulchre tools with the Mysterious Stranger?
Should the XP per log chopped from the Blisterwood Tree be reset to 76 XP, as it was on the Darkmeyer release date?
Should the effect of the Amulet of Blood Fury be improved to have a 20% chance to heal for 30% of Melee damage inflicted?
Should we make the Dark Graceful outfit even darker, as pictured in the blog?
Should we add hill giants to the empty area east of Al Kharid as described in the Poll Blog?
Should we recolour the Saradomin Halo to better match Saradomin’s colour scheme and themes?

Should we add Mahogany Homes, a slower and cheaper way to train Construction which provides Carpenter Points and Construction XP? Carpenter Points would be exchangeable for rewards in the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop.

If Question #1 passes, should the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop offer the Carpenter's Outfit? Like other skilling outfits, each piece will boost Construction XP to a maximum 2.5% when the full set is worn.
If Question #1 passes, should the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop offer the Plank Sack? This is a new Inventory item that would be able to store a maximum of 28 planks of any type.
If Question #3 passes, should Ultimate Iron players be allowed to purchase the Plank Sack from the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop?
If Question #1 passes, should the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop offer an Equippable Saw? This item would perform all the functions of the regular saw but could be wielded in the main hand slot.
If Question #1 passes, should the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop offer the Hosidius Wall Kit for your Player Owned House?
If Question #1 passes, should the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop offer Construction Supply Crates? Each crate would contain various Construction materials.
Would you like a new novice-level quest called ‘A Porcine of Interest’ to be added to the game, along with a new Slayer monster?
Should we move Turael from Burthorpe to Draynor Village, as described in the blog?
Should we add Tempoross, a medium intensity fishing skill boss with competitive XP rates between level 35-70?
If Question 1 passes, should Spirit Bait be a potential reward from Tempoross?

If Question 1 passes, should the Tome of Water and Damp Pages be potential rewards from Tempoross? When wielded, this would count as unlimited Water Runes and increase accuracy of Standard Spellbook water, weakening and binding spells.
If Question 3 passes, should the Tome of Water also slightly increase the duration of Binding Spells from the Standard Spellbook? This would affect Bind, Snare and Entangle.

If Question 3 passes, should the Tome of Water slightly increase the effectiveness of curse spells from the Standard Spellbook? This would affect Confuse, Weaken, Curse, Vulnerability, Enfeeble and Stun.
If Question 1 passes, should the Fish Barrel be a potential reward from Tempoross?
If Question 1 passes, should the Tackle Box be a potential reward from Tempoross?

If Question 1 passes, should we add the Spirit Angler's outfit as an alternative style earned by combining an item earned from the boss with pieces of the standard Angler's outfit? You would be able to get another Angler's outfit from existing sources if desired.
If Question 6 passes, should the Fish Barrel be available to Ultimate Iron players as a reward from Tempoross?
If Question 7 passes, should the Tackle Box be available to Ultimate Iron players as a reward from Tempoross?

Should the Trailblazer Relic Hunter Outfit, a cosmetic armour described in the blog, be added to the Leagues Reward Shop? This will consist of three tiers of cosmetic outfits that represent the League.
Should the Trailblazer League Themed Banner, as described in the blog, be added to the Leagues Reward Shop? This item will be like the Twisted League banner and held in the main-hand slot.
Should the Trailblazer League Home Teleport Animation, as described in the blog, be added to the Leagues Reward Store?

Should the Trailblazer League Skilling Tool Upgrade Kit, as described in the blog, be added to the Leagues Reward Store? Each kit will allow the player to add a Trailblazer theme to their Dragon Pickaxe, Dragon Axe or Dragon Harpoon.

Should the Trailblazer Graceful Set Ornament Kit, as described in the blog, be added to the League Reward Store? This six-pack of kits will allow you to add a Trailblazer theme to any and all parts of your Graceful Set.

Should we add a League Trophy Room to the Player Owned House, as described in the blog? It will require 27 Construction and 15,000 GP to build. If this question does not pass, players will still be able to store League Trophies in the Toy Box.
If Question 6 passes, should a Trailblazer Globe Statue be made available in the Leagues Reward Store? It could be displayed in the League Trophy Room in the Player Owned House.
If Question 6 passes, should a Trailblazer themed rug, as described in the blog, be added to the League Reward Store?
Should we add a right click option to the Estate Agent to allow players to quickly move or redecorate their homes?
Should we expand the PoH Combat dummy to include the suggested functionality? Players will need 58 Construction to be able to attach these upgrades.
Should we change the drop rate of the Jar of Darkness from 1/2,500 to 1/500?

Should we increase the base number of charges on the Skull Sceptre from 5 base charges to 10? After completing the Varrock Achievement Diary tiers this will increase it to 14, 18, 22 and 26 respectively. Currently completing these diaries raises the total charges to 7, 9, 11 and 13.
Should we allow players to crush Skull Sceptre pieces into tradable, stackable chunks? These chunks can then be used to charge the imbued Skull Sceptre.
Should the Skull Sceptre no longer be destroyed on death?
Should we lower the reward tier required for a permanent rope down to the Kalphite Queen from the Desert Achievement Diary from Elite to Hard?
Once players have reached 99 slayer, should we allow them to show their Skill Cape once to any Slayer Master, allowing them to receive tasks regardless of Combat level?
Should we add a right click option to Gnome Gliders allowing you to travel to your last destination quickly? This would act similarly to charter ships.
Should we add a Beekeepers outfit to go with the Beekeeper random event? Regardless of whether this passes we'd also update the random event to be less annoying.
Should we add a count-down timer to the Volcanic Mine waiting room so players can see the time remaining until a game starts?
Should we remove the Volcanic Mine points cap?

Should we add two toggles for fossils on Fossil Island? These would allow players to disable dropping of small, medium and large fossils on one toggle, and rare ones on another. This would stop them being given from monsters, skilling and other activities on Fossil Island.
Should scavenger spawns be consistent and determined based on groups sizes?

Should we change it so scavengers drop the loot to whoever deals the highest damage? If that player is an Ironman, then all players would be able to pick up the loot (similar to how it works with other bosses in CoX).
Should we implement the proposed change to Chambers of Xeric map generation?
Should players completely negate all damage from husks and parasites if they pray correctly?
Should we change the scaling for shields and totems to 200/30 per player for groups of five upwards?
Should the start time for the first Nightmare fight of an instance be reduced from 40 seconds to 30 seconds? Subsequent fights would then begin when the Nightmare is disturbed.
Should we change the scaling of the Nightmare pet drop chance as described above?
Should we reduce the special attack cost of the Eldritch Staff from 75% to 55% so that it matches the Volatile Staff?
Should we change the on-death behaviour for Ava's Devices so they are no longer destroyed on death?
Should we add the ability to swap out ammunition in the Toxic Blowpipe without needed to remove the current ammunition first? This will be done by using the new ammunition on the blowpipe.
Should we add the Soul Wars minigame as described in the blog?
If Question #1 passes, should the Soul Wars Reward Shop sell Combat XP (Attack, Strength, Defence, HitPoints, Ranged, Magic, and Prayer)?
Should the Soul Wars Reward Shop be able to imbue equipment, like the Nightmare Zone reward shop does? The Nightmare Zone shop won't be changed in any way.

If Question #1 passes, should the Soul Wars Reward Shop sell the Soul Cape, as described in the blog? You can freely change the colour of the cape, it requires level 70 Prayer, and provides an +8 Prayer bonus.
If Question #1 passes, should the Soul Wars Reward Shop sell the Ectoplasmator, as described in the blog? This item grants Prayer XP whenever ghostly creatures are killed.
If Question #1 passes, should the Soul Wars Reward Shop sell a Lucky Dip, as described in the blog? This would be similar to the Barbarian Assault Gamble option.
Should the Last Man Standing Reward Shop be able to imbue equipment, like the Nightmare Zone reward shop does? The Nightmare Zone shop won't be changed in any way.
Should we add a Games Zone to the Grand Exchange and various pubs across Gielinor, as described in the blog? In these areas you'll be able to play minigames found in the Games Room.
Should we change Trouble Brewing's requirements so that completion of Cabin Fever and Level 40 Cooking are no longer needed?

Should we add designated Ferox Enclave game worlds which limits players to only the content within the Enclave? Players won't be able to leave the Enclave, and can only play the minigames found within the area.
Should we allow Barbarian Assault players to 'call' whilst interacting with machines?
Should we remove gameplay delays when repairing traps within Barbarian Assault?

Should we add a new potion to the supply table in Castle Wars bases, as described in the blog? This potion will offer the boosting effects of a Super combat potion, a Ranging potion, and an Imbued Heart all-in-one.

Should we add two new NPCs to the Grand Exchange to recruit players to play upcoming Castle Wars matches? The Saradominist and Zamorakian Recruiters will advertise matches and teleport players to the game lobby.
Should the Castle Wars Reward Shop sell new Full Helm and Boots rewards? These items will be themed to the existing armour sets sold in the shop.
Should we add new crop circle locations around Gielinor, as described in the blog? These crop circles teleport players to play the Impetuous Impulses minigame on Puro-Puro.
Should we add Farmer's Affinity, a new 30 minute buff, which is granted when accessing Puro-Puro through surface crop circles? The buff allows you to push through wheat more easily.
Should Elnock, the gnome on Puro-Puro, allow you to store Imp catching equipment?
Should Elnock, the gnome on Puro-Puro, sell a small number of impling jars?
Should we add new impling spawns all around Gielinor, with a focus on areas which currently lack spawns?
Should we allow you to choose whether or not to gain Strength XP whilst navigating the maze on Puro-Puro?
Should we rework Shades of Mort'ton as described in the blog?

If Question #22 passes, the Mort'ton catacombs would require a layout change. In the blog we offered two visual styles. Do you prefer option A or option B? The most popular choice will be implemented.
If Question #22 passes, should we add the Wearable Coffin, as described in the blog, as a possible reward to the minigame? This item fits within the cape slot, and can store shade remains.

If Question #22 passes, should we add the prayer robes, as described in the blog, as a possible reward to the minigame? These untradeable robes don't offer combat stats but offer the unique effect of saving bones and ensouled heads when training Prayer.
Should Splitbark armour be made to be craftable, as described in the blog? Currently only an NPC can create the armour.

Should we add the Swampbark armour set, as described in the blog? It's a variant of Splitbark, created using the Runecraft skill, which offers Magic and Defence equipment stats and a unique binding-buff set effect.

Should we add the Bloodbark armour set, as described in the blog? it's a variant of Splitbark, created using the Runecraft skill, which offers Magic and Defence equipment stats and a unique buff to blood spell effects.
Would you like a new intermediate-level quest 'Getting Ahead' to be added to the game?

Should Combat Achievements, a new system that tasks players with defeating various bosses throughout Gielinor in multiple ways and of varying difficulty, be added to the game? Completion of Combat Achievements will not be required in obtaining the Achievement Diary cape.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should each fully completed tier of tasks reward players with an XP lamp? The amount of experience given would increase as you progress through the different tiers.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should each fully completed tier of tasks give players a 5% increased chance of receiving Clue Scrolls from PvM and Skilling activities as described? Clue scrolls obtained from Impling Jars or from Clue Caskets would not benefit from this increase.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should each fully completed tier of tasks increase the maximum number of all bosses that can be assigned by a Slayer Master when 'Like a Boss' is unlocked?

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Master and Grandmaster tiers increase the maximum number of TzTok-Jad and TzKal-Zuk that can be assigned? Master tier would grant an additional assigned kill, and Grandmaster would grant an additional two assigned kills. Failing to defeat either assigned boss would result in losing one of the assigned kills.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Elite, Master and Grandmaster tiers unlock new Slayer Helmet designs? The designs would be based around TzTok-Jad for Elite tier, Lady Verzik Vitur for Master tier and TzKal-Zuk for Grandmaster tier.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should a new offhand that excels in providing increased Melee accuracy also be added to the game? This would provide an increasing amount of Stab, Slash and Crush attacks for each fully completed tier of tasks, but has no defensive or strength bonuses.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should each fully completed tier of tasks unlock daily teleports to the boulder outside God Wars Dungeon? Completion of the Easy tier would grant three daily teleports, Medium would grant five, and tiers Hard and above would unlock unlimited daily teleports.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Elite tier and above unlock daily teleports to the inner ring of Mor Ul Rek? Completion of the Elite tier would grant three daily teleports, Master would grant five, and Grandmaster would unlock unlimited daily teleports.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Hard tier and above allow players to enter the various God chambers with a slightly reduced follower kill count? Completion of the Hard tier would reduce the requirement by two kills, Elite by four, Master by seven and Grandmaster would reduce it by 10.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Hard tier and above give players an increased drop rate for Ecumenical Keys? Completion of the Hard tier would change to a 1/55 chance, Elite to 1/50, Master to 1/45 and Grandmaster would change to a 1/40 chance.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Hard tier and above give players access to a personal instance for each of the boss chambers within God Wars Dungeon? These instances would cost coins and the required minion kill count, or coins and an Ecumenical Key to enter. These instances would be for solo players only.

Should players be able to pay the coins fee for private instances by taking it directly from Death's Coffer, should they have the available funds? This would apply to all current and future private instances throughout the game.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Hard tier reward players with the ability to combine a King Black Dragon head with the Dragon Hunter Crossbow as shown in the image? Combining these items offers no additional bonuses and is for cosmetic purposes only.

If Combat Achievements are added to the game, should completing all tasks within the Elite tier reward players with the ability to combine a Vorkath head with the Dragon Hunter Crossbow as shown in the image? Combining these items offers no additional bonuses and is for cosmetic purposes only.

Should TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Six JalTok-Jad Challenge, a new PvM encounter within Mor Ul Rek, be added to the game? Each challenge includes defeating a number of JalTok-Jads, climbing until there are six at the same time. Completing this challenge unlocks a new JalRek-Jad transmog for the TzRek-Jad pet.

Should Tempoross, a new scalable boss based around the Fishing skill, be added to the game? Tempoross would have competitive Fishing XP rates alongside granting small amounts of Cooking and Construction XP. The encounter is considered a safe activity.

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players be able to fish a pool of debris left behind after the encounter, providing a selection of noted fish based on your fishing level as well as small amounts of other resources, such as ore?

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players be rewarded with Spirit Flakes after the encounter? Spirit Flakes would be a common untradeable resource that when automatically consumed while fishing, provides a 50% chance of catching an extra fish for no additional XP. This effect stacks with Rada's Blessing and the flakes can be used on any type of fish.

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players have a chance to obtain an untradeable Fish Barrel as a reward after the encounter? The Fish Barrel can store a total of 28 raw fish, and can store multiple species of fish simultaneously. Fish can only be removed from the barrel at a Bank.

If the Fish Barrel is added to the game, should players be able to combine it with the Fish Sack from Molch Island to create an equippable version of the Fish Barrel that would be worn in the cape slot?

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players have a chance to obtain an untradeable Tackle Box as a reward after the encounter? The Tackle Box allows players to store fishing equipment including rods, feathers, bait and the Angler's outfit?
If the Fish Barrel is added to the game, should it also be made available to Ultimate Iron players?
If the Tackle Box is added to the game, should it also be made available to Ultimate Iron players?

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players be able to obtain the Spirit Angler's outfit as a reward after the encounter by combining an item earned from the boss with pieces of the standard Angler's outfit? It would have the same stats and Fishing XP bonus as the standard Angler's outfit. You would be able to get another Angler's outfit from existing sources if desired.

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players have a chance to obtain an untradeable Harpoonfish Trophy as a reward after the encounter? The Harpoonfish Trophy can be mounted in a Player Owned House to showcase your Fishing prowess.

If Tempoross is added to the game, should players have a chance to obtain a tradeable Tome of Water and Soaked Pages as a reward after the encounter? When wielded, the charged Tome of Water would count as unlimited Water Runes and increase accuracy of Standard Spellbook Water, Weakening and Binding spells. The charged Tome of Water is untradeable.

If the Tome of Water is added to the game, should the charged version provide an increase the duration of Binding Spells from the Standard Spellbook? This would affect Bind, Snare and Entangle. This would stack with the effects of Swampbark armour.
If the Tome of Water is added to the game, should the charged version provide a 20% damage increase to Standard Spellbook Water spells in addition to the other effects on offer?
If the Tome of Water is added to the game, should the charged version provide a 20% accuracy increase to Ancient Magicks Ice spells in addition to the other effects on offer?

If Tempoross and Spirit Flakes are added to the game, should players have the ability to recolour the Heron pet by using Spirit Flakes on it? You'd be able to return the Heron back to its normal self by using raw fish on it.
If Tempoross is added to the game, should players have a very rare chance to obtain the Dragon Harpoon as a reward after the encounter?

Should a timer be added to the Fishing Trawler minigame that tells players when the next trawl is going to start? NPC's on and around the boat will shout the timer, making sure it is visible for anyone on the boat or standing at the bank chest to see.

Should the activity meter within the Fishing Trawler minigame be replaced by a contribution meter instead? Your contribution meter would not deplete over time, but you will have to contribute a certain amount in order to be eligible for rewards. A message will be displayed in-game when you have reached enough contribution to earn rewards.

If the contribution meter is added to the Fishing Trawler minigame, should the amount of fish players receive from the Fishing Trawler minigame be increased based on your contribution amount? Ending the trawl with full contribution would provide up to 50% more fish.

If the contribution meter is added to the Fishing Trawler minigame, should the chance players have of receiving the Heron pet be increased based on your contribution amount? This would scale from a 0% chance at no contribution, to double the current chance if you are at full contribution when the trawl ends.
Should the amount of experience players receive for completing the Fishing Trawler minigame be increased by 50% for each fish obtained at the end of a trawl?
Should repairing the nets during the Fishing Trawler minigame reward players with a small amount of Crafting experience? Each net repaired would provide approximately 5 Crafting experience.
Should filling the holes during the Fishing Trawler minigame reward players with a small amount of Construction experience? Each hole filled would provide approximately 5 Construction experience.

Should the time it takes to complete a game of Fishing Trawler be reduced from 10 minutes to 5 minutes? The wait time between each trawl would remain at two minutes. If this question passes, the rate of obtaining the Angler's Outfit would be increased from 1/8 to 1/12 to reflect the shorter game times.

If the contribution meter is added to the Fishing Trawler minigame, should we add the ability for Kraken tentacles to spawn near the net and attack it? Players will need to chop back the tentacles using an axe and fill the holes left behind for a large amount of contribution. Failing to do this will result in a lower amount of fish received at the end of a trawl.
Should A Kingdom Divided, a new experienced-level addition to the Kourend quest series, be added to the game?
Should the Arceuus spellbook Reanimation spells be reworked as described in the blog? No changes will be made to the amount of experience granted from reanimated creatures.

Should the Lumbridge Graveyard Teleport within the Arceuus spellbook be changed to teleport players to the north of the Grand Library in Arceuus instead? Any Magic Tablets for the previous locations would be updated to their respective new location.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should the Grasp spells be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use these spells.

If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should the Resurrection spells be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use these spells. If this question passes, the Book of the Dead would also be added to the game as a reward from A Kingdom Divided, acting as an upgrade to the completed Kharedsts' Memoirs. The Book of the Dead would provide +6 Magic attack and +3 Prayer bonus.

If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should the Demonbane spells be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use these spells.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Shadow Veil be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Dark Lure be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Mark of Darkness be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.

If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should the Corruption spells be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use these spells.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Vile Vigour be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Cleanse be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Ward of Arceuus be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Death Charge be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If A Kingdom Divided is added to the game, should Sinister Offering be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
Should that Magic attack bonus of the Skull Sceptre be increased from +4 Magic to +10 Magic?

Should Demonic Ash be added to the game? Demonic Ash would replace the ash that usually drops from certain creatures. It can be scattered into the air for a small amount of Prayer experience, just as burying bones does. Demonic Ashes would not work with Prayer altars or the Ectofuntus.
If Demonic Ash is added to the game, should Demonic Offering be added to the Arceuus spellbook as described in the blog? Completion of A Kingdom Divided will be required to use this spell.
If Demonic Ash is added to the game, should Hellhounds drop Demonic Ashes instead of bones? If this question passes, Hellhounds and Cerberus will also be categorised as Demons.
Should the Shayzien area be updated as described in the blog?

If the Shayzien area rework passes, should part of the rework include adding a new Agility course? This course would be aimed at lower Agility levels and split into two sections. The first section of the course would require 5 Agility to complete and the second section of the course would require 48 Agility to complete.
Should a variety of low-level mobs be added to various areas within Kourend as described in the blog?
Should the number of total unique items you have obtained be added to the top of the Collection Log?
Should the colour of each section within the Collection Log change when they have been fully completed?

Should the Collection Log show the kill count for each mode of the content? For example, Challenge Mode Chambers of Xeric, Corrupted Gauntlet and the individual Dagannoth Kings would each show their respective kill counts.

Should Gilded and 3rd Age pieces from the Hard, Elite and Master Clue Scroll sections be separated into their own sections so it’s more feasible to complete them? Hard, Elite and Master Mega-rare Clue Scroll sections would be added specifically for these items.
Should we update the side-panel as shown in the blog, so you can open the Collection Log from it, without needing the book?
Should a search function be added to the Collection Log, allowing players to search for specific items or bosses based on the section they're in?

Should a tracker be added to the Collection Log showing how many times a player has completed the Gnome Restaurant minigame? If this question passes, only new completions after the update will be tracked.

Should a toggle be added to in-game completion and kill times to allow them to display the exact time, instead of a time rounded down to the nearest second? This would allow players to judge their times more accurately, based on the game cycle. By default, this option would be toggled off.
Should a transmog option be added to the Baby Mole pet, allowing players to use a Mole Claw on it to turn it into a Baby Mole-rat? A Mole Skin could be used to revert the transformation.

Should a small chest be added outside the Theatre of Blood entrance, allowing players to claim any loot they missed out on from their previous completion? Should this chest contain an item that is normally broadcast to the raiding party then they will receive the broadcast as if the party member was present at the time.

Should the Jar of Spirits be added to the Corporeal Beast loot table? This jar can be used to showcase your very own Corporeal Beast in your Player Owned House. Inclusion of the jar would not impact the drop rate of existing unique items and would have a drop rate of 1/1000.

Should the junk drops such as Tinderboxes, Fire Talismans and Bullseye Lanterns on the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil's loot table be made rarer, improving the overall average value of the drop? The rate of obtaining unique items will not be impacted by this change.

Should the Jar of Smoke be added to the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil loot table? This jar can be used to showcase your very own Thermonuclear Smoke Devil in your Player Owned House. Inclusion of the jar would not impact the drop rate of existing unique items and would have a drop rate of 1/2000.
Should there be a small chance of receiving bird's egg nests when emptying a full bird house? This change would not impact the amount of seed nests you would otherwise receive.

Should we increase the maximum number of charges the Amulet of Blood Fury can hold from 10,000 to 30,000? If this question passes, it will be possible to recharge an existing Amulet of Blood Fury by using a Blood Shard on it to replenish up to 10,000 charges. Newly created Amulets of Blood Fury would still start with 10,000 charges.

Should it be possible for Patchy the pirate to combine the Dark Claw from Skotizo and Flippers from Mogres to create the Dark Flippers? The Dark Flippers are a cosmetic alternative to the Flippers and maintain the same functionality as the originals.

Should players with level 40 Construction be able to create a STASH unit tracker within their Player-Owned House as a new option for the Wall Chart? Upon clicking the STASH unit tracker, an interface would open showing the player where all STASH unit locations are, and whether they have built and filled them.

Should a new shortcut be added to the cliff in Viyeldi Caves, allowing players to scale down the cliff faster than if they were to manually navigate their way down? This shortcut would require 91 Agility and a Long Rope from the Darkmeyer General Store to complete. A Long Rope will only be required once to unlock this shortcut.

Should bloodvelds (all variants), icefiends, waterfiends, pyrefiends (including superiors), pyrelords (including superiors) and Porazdir be classified as demons in-game to match the lore surrounding them? If this question passes, items with bonuses towards demons, such as Arclight, will also be effective against these creatures other than Porazdir.
Should it be possible to use Vesta's Longsword in combat against other players in PvP worlds? The Longsword would lose all bonuses when used against NPCs, effectively turning it into a cosmetic item.

Should the parasites mechanic in the Nightmare of Ashihama encounter be changed so the amount they heal is more consistent, rather than rolling a random number between one and their maximum amount until they are killed?

Should all of the Blighted items available in the Last Man Standing store also be added to the Soul Wars store? Each Blighted item would cost 10 Zeal to purchase. It would not be possible to sell these items back to the store for Zeal.
If the Blighted items are added to the Soul Wars Reward Shop, should it also be possible to use the spell sacks within the minigame? It would not be possible to use the Blighted food or potions.
Should the Isle of Souls be updated so that it is accessible to players and includes a variety of skilling resources and NPCs as described in the blog?

If the Isle of Souls is updated to allow players to explore it, should a dungeon including a variety of monsters be added too? If this question passes, Konar would be updated to assign Greater Demons, Fire Giants, Blue Dragons and Iron Dragons within the dungeon.

If the Isle of Souls dungeon is added to the game, should the end of the dungeon include 2 Adamantite and 1 Runite rocks to mine? They would be far away from any Bank and would require navigating past various monsters. The rocks would be surrounded by aggressive skeletons with an iron dragon nearby.

If the Isle of Souls dungeon is added to the game, should a Thieving chest also be added towards the end of the dungeon that can be looted for 150 Thieving experience and a number of items with an average value of approximately 700gp?

If the Isle of Souls is made explorable, should a Crumbling Tower including 10 forgotten souls also be added? These would be new ghostly NPCs similar to chaos druids but slightly stronger and with a marginally improved loot table.

If the Crumbling Tower and the dungeon is added to the Isle of Souls, should the tower include a basement with four chests that are unlocked by using an Dark Key on them? The Dark Key would be a potential untradeable reward from a chest within the dungeon. The basement chests would reward 1.5k Thieving experience and a number of items with an average value of approximately 30,000 GP.
Should we add the Below Ice Mountain quest? This will be a new free-to-play quest that unlocks Ice Mountain Dungeon.
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add the Religious Offerings skilling activity, as described in the dev blog?
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add the Golem Cores skilling activity, as described in the dev blog?
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add the Gathering Relics skilling activity, as described in the dev blog?
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add the Vault minigame, as described in the dev blog?
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add the Barronite Mace weapon, as described in the dev blog?
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add the Dwarven Hammer skilling item, as described in the dev blog?
If Below Ice Mountain is added, should we add Ruin Area buffs as a reward which increase your skilling efforts within the Ice Mountain Dungeon?
Should we update the Bolt Pouch interface to a more user-friendly format, as described in the dev blog?
Should we update the Bolt Pouch so that stored contents behave similarly on death to items like the Seed box?
Should we add the Shooting Stars skilling activity, as described in the dev blog?
If Shooting Stars is added, should we add the untradeable Celestial Ring as a reward which offers a hidden Mining boost?

If the Celestial Ring is added as a reward, should it be possible to charge the ring with Stardust, offering a 1/10 chance at obtaining extra ore when mining? Each Stardust will add one charge up to a max of 10,000 charges. Every time ore is mined from a suitable rock, a charge will be lost from the ring.

If the Celestial Ring is added as a reward, should it be possible to combine it with an Elven Signet, granting players the effects of both? This will require 70 Crafting and Smithing, 100 Crystal Shards and 1000 Stardust. An NPC will combine the rings for players without the requirement for an extra 50 Crystal Shards. This process is will not be reversible and the combined ring would be untradeable.
If Shooting Stars is added, should we add the untradeable Star Fragment as a reward which will allow you to recolour your Prospector Outfit?
If Shooting Stars is added, should we add the untradeable Bag Full of Gems as a reward? These will work as any other Bag Full of Gems.
If Shooting Stars is added, should we add the untradeable Soft Clay Pack as a reward? This will work like any other Soft Clay Pack.
If Shooting Stars is added, should we add the untradeable Essence Pack as a reward? These packs will give 100 Pure Essence when opened.

Should we add the ability for players to store one Slayer task on their account for later? The ability to store a Slayer task will cost players 1,000 Slayer points. It will cost 50 Points per Slayer task stored. This will not work for Wilderness-related tasks.
Should we redesign the current Slayer Helmets to the proposed Slayer Helmet Designs as shown above?
Should a unique animation be added for both Hydra’s Ranged and Magic attack styles, adding an alternate way of identifying which style is going to be used next?
Should each Respirator dealt with during an encounter with the Abyssal Sire grant 50 Slayer XP? This would be capped at a maximum of four Respirators per encounter (200 Slayer XP).
Should more Bloodveld spawn in the God Wars Dungeon for Konar’s Tasks?
Should we add a Dust Devil area under the Kharidian desert, with a Slayer assignment required to fight the Dust Devils?

Should we add a Skeletal Wyverns shortcut as shown in the blog post? The shortcut will take players from just before the entrance to the Ice Warriors and Giants into the west side of the Skeletal Wyvern Cavern. This would require 72 Agility.
Should fishing explosives awaken the boss Kraken and all its tentacles simultaneously when thrown into the water?
Should we add a quick right-click option to board the Zulrah boat?
Should the amount of potential Zulrah assigned to tasks be increased from 15 to 35?
Should we remove the damage from the Orbs (energy spheres) in Grotesque Guardians when correctly absorbed?
Should a visual cue be added to the Grotesque Guardians to show where the stuns will land?

Should Corporeal Beast no longer reset to full health if there are no players in the cave? Corporeal Beast would instead quickly regenerate health. Corporeal Beast would still fully reset if it has not been interacted with for three minutes.
Should players be allowed to create a crystal inside the Gauntlet from items inside the Gauntlet that allows them to single-click teleport back to the lobby?

Should a new type of fish be added to the Gauntlet and its Corrupted version which acts as a combo food? Players would combine 10 Crystal Shards with a Paddlefish in the entrance room which would create a new type of 'combo food' fish.
Should we introduce a way for players to recolour the Corrupted Blade of Saeldor by using Crystals provided by Lliann in her shop? Each Crystal corresponds with its matching recolour option.
Should we change the current points scaling/rounding system in the Chambers of Xeric to award points to players more accurately?
Should players be allowed to uncap the difficulty of Chambers of Xeric to the highest difficulty (115)?
Should we add a default chest in the Chambers of Xeric which allows players to store 25 items (no shared storage) the moment the raid starts? It can be upgraded with planks as normal.
Should the current limit of players who get rare drops in Chambers of Xeric raids be increased from three to six?
Should herb patches in the Chambers of Xeric scale linearly with raid size to make them live longer in larger groups?
Should we add a way to cure poison using herbs in the Chambers of Xeric?
Should we add an Iron pickaxe spawn near the entrance of the Guardians Room?
Should players be able to use any Ice spell to help clear the flame wall in Olm’s special attack?
In Challenge Mode, should we remove the 50% additional stats in health and defence of the Crystals in the Vasa room of Chambers of Xeric?
In Challenge Mode Chambers of Xeric, should we reduce the variance of hits made by the Large Muttadile while submerged?
Should Vanguards take damage as they transition if the player is attacking them?
Should players be allowed to save their special attack when entering and exiting Chambers of Xeric?
Should players be allowed to save their special attack when entering and exiting Theatre of Blood?

Should we reduce the variance in locations for the spawns of Maidens in the Theatre of Blood and should we also reward players for successfully dodging the blood by only spawning a maximum of one Blood Spawn?
Should Inferno Bats stop draining player stats when prayed against correctly, so that Prayer protection works as intended? They will still be able to drain run energy.
Should regular Nylocas damage count towards MvP participation in the Maiden and Verzik rooms, in order to better reward team play? This would not count in the Nylocas room itself.

Should players be able allowed a means to activate another player’s Theatre of Blood teleport remotely? Players would have to opt-in to accept remote teleportation in order to avoid griefing. This would not work once Verzik has been killed.
Should we allow the party leader to re-order their party via the Party Board in the Theatre of Blood lobby?
Should we add a filter to the Theatre of Blood Party Board which allows players to find their friends’ or clanmates’ parties more easily?
Should the Skull Sceptre (i) be able to auto-cast Crumble Undead both in free-to-play and P2P?
Should we allow players to disable the initial message box warning when entering a Barrows tunnel?
Should we add an Orange and Blue transmog to Sarachnis via the method described in the blog post?
Should Zealot's Robes provide a Prayer Bonus which is slightly higher than Monk’s Robes by +1 on each piece?
Should players be able to turn off the Dagannoth Bones perk from the Fremmennik Elite Diary via the Achievement Diary NPC? Players can switch it back on by speaking to the NPC again.
Should the Bonecrusher be able to crush bones dropped by the NPCs mentioned in the blog post?

Should we add a new item called the Ash Sanctifier? This would allow players to cleanse demonic ashes in a similar fashion to the way the Bonecrusher works with bones, awarding half the usual Prayer XP for each Ash sanctified.

Should the (charged) Tome of Water buff players' weaken spell effectiveness by 50% when equipped? This would mean that Confuse, Weaken, Curse, Vulnerability, Enfeeble and Stun spell effects are increased by 50%.
Should we increase Shooting Stars XP to the amount shown in the table above (about 20%)?
Should we add Padlock Sprites to the Mobile and Desktop interfaces to show players where a non-skill requirement for a spell has not yet been met?
Should the winning entry from our Design A Hat competition be implemented and redeemable from Diango?
Would you like A Night At The Theatre, a new Master level quest, to be added to the game? Story Mode, a new difficulty level for Theatre of Blood, will also be added with the quest.
Would you like a Hard Mode added to the Theatre of Blood? The boss fight mechanics will be updated to make each encounter more challenging, and rewards will be improved.
If Question #2 passes, would you like us to add an item which unlocks the ability to metamorphise Lil' Zik into any of the Theatre of Blood bosses?

If Hard Mode passes, an untradeable item will be added as a potential reward which can change the appearance of some weapons. Would you like this item to change the appearance of the Scythe of Vitur into a Saradominist-themed weapon, as shown in the blog?

If Hard Mode passes, an untradeable item will be added as a potential reward which can change the appearance of some weapons. Would you like this item to change the appearance of the Ghrazi Rapier into a Saradominist-themed weapon, as shown in the blog?

If Hard Mode passes, an untradeable item will be added as a potential reward which can change the appearance of some weapons. Would you like this item to change the appearance of the Sanguinesti Staff into a Saradominist-themed weapon, as shown in the blog?

Should Phosani’s Nightmare, a vastly different solo-only version of The Nightmare of Ashihama encounter, be added to the game? The boss fight mechanics would be updated to make the encounter more challenging and engaging. The rewards would be improved to match these changes.
Should the proposed randomised phase rotations and Protection Prayer changes for Phosani's Nightmare also be made for The Nightmare of Ashihama?
If Phosani’s Nightmare is added to the game, should there be a chance to receive an item that transforms the Little Nightmare pet into a Parasite version?

If Phosani's Nightmare is added to the game, should defeating her have a chance at dropping an item that allow players to teleport closer to the encounter? You can vote on how this teleport item works in the next two questions.

If Poll Question #4 passes and the teleport item is added to the game, how should this item be introduced? The highest voted option will win and be implemented into the game.

Option 1: The teleport should implemented via an upgrade to Drakan’s Medallion.

Option 2: The teleport should be implemented via untradeable teleport scrolls that drop from the encounter, similar to Key Master teleport from Cerberus.

If untradeable teleport scrolls are the preferred option in Poll Question #5, where should they take you? The highest voted option will win and be implemented into the game.
